bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with biao chuang 熛瘡 , flaming-heat sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu zhu yu 吳茱萸 quoting Bing bu shou ji 兵部手集 : 小兒瘭瘡：一名火灼瘡，一名火爛瘡。茱萸煎酒， 拭之良 , “ Flaming-heat-illness sores in children: another name is ‘sores following scorching by fire’. Another name is ‘festering fire sores’. Prepare a wine decoction with zhu yu and rub the [afflicted regions with it]. Good”.
